text: E ba le bo-’nete ba hore tsohle tse maholimong le tse lefats’eng ke tsa Allah. Etsoe U tseba boemo ba lona. O tseba ka botlalo mohla letsatsi leo ba tlang ho khutlela ho Eena, hore A tle A ba tsebise lintho tseo ba neng ba li etsa. Hobane Allah U tseba lintho tsohle. Ka lebitso la Allah, Ea Lereko, Mong`a hao
